sourcesContent:
<template>
  <PortfolioList
    title="视频作品"
    description="分享创意视频作品，展现独特视角"
    type="video"
    :categories="videoCategories"
    :menu-groups="videoMenuGroups"
  />
</template>

<script setup>
import PortfolioList from '@/components/portfolio/PortfolioList.vue'

const videoCategories = [
  { id: 'all', name: '全部' },
  {
    id: 'commercial',
    name: '商业广告',
    children: [
      { id: 'product', name: '产品广告' },
      { id: 'brand', name: '品牌广告' },
      { id: 'service', name: '服务广告' }
    ]
  },
  {
    id: 'vlog',
    name: '生活记录',
    children: [
      { id: 'daily', name: '日常生活' },
      { id: 'travel', name: '旅行' },
      { id: 'food', name: '美食' }
    ]
  },
  {
    id: 'tutorial',
    name: '教程',
    children: [
      { id: 'software', name: '软件教程' },
      { id: 'skill', name: '技能教学' },
      { id: 'diy', name: 'DIY教程' }
    ]
  }
]

const videoMenuGroups = [
  {
    title: '视频分类',
    items: videoCategories.map(category => ({
      name: category.name,
      path: `/portfolio/video?category=${category.id}`,
      icon: category.id === 'all' ? HomeIcon :
            category.id === 'commercial' ? FilmIcon :
            category.id === 'vlog' ? VideoCameraIcon :
            AcademicCapIcon
    }))
  }
]
</script>
